sentences.english: The reason I didn't score any points last year was because we were gamblers.
sentences.chinese: 去年我沒有獲得任何積分的原因是我們是賭棍。

sentences.english: Gamblers and confidence men prey on Jack and many of his friends.
sentences.chinese: 賭棍和騙子常靠騙取傑克及其許多朋友的錢財過活。

sentences.english: One who acts as a decoy, as in a confidence game.
sentences.chinese: 誘騙者，賭棍同夥充當眼線的人，如在一場騙局中。
